TEXT.Text: I'll do it.
I refuse.
I'm doing it.
I'm done.
Port of the Winds
Do you need help?
I'll be counting on you.
Wha..what? Ok, fine. Just forget it!
Completion accepted.
Completion denied.
Your bags are full.
Please hurry.
Lord's Sword (1)

Ahem! %% I am the Lord's humble servant, Vincent. My liege has in his esteemed possession, a sword that he adores. However, it has recently been tarnished due to a lack of action.%% So what could I do for my Lord? I delivered the sword to {C=0xFF016295/}Blacksmith Smith{C=0xFF4D0D08/} in {C=0xFF016295/}Moonlight Shore Village {C=0xFF4D0D08/} for repairs. But dear me, I do not have the time to collect the sword from him.%% It wouldn't bother you terribly, to retrieve the sword from {C=0xFF016295/}Blacksmith Smith {C=0xFF4D0D08/} on my behalf, would it?%% I will reward you well for this favor.
You haven't left? Please hurry.
Did you lose the letter of introduction? I'll give you another one.
What is the matter?
A Letter of Introduction! Are you the one who came on an errand for the sword? Hmmmm... could you talk to me later?
Hm? Where is your Letter of Introduction?%% You don't have it? Are you trying to get me killed?! I can't give you the sword without the letter of introduction!!
Find Blacksmith Smith
Lord's Sword (2)
How can I help you?
Haven't you gone yet? Could you hurry? Vincent is waiting for you.
You lost the sword! Thomas was just here. He said she saw it on the road...%% I shall present you with another opportunity. Retrieve it, and do not disappoint me.
What is the matter?

And where, pray tell, is the sword?%% Right! This is the Lord's sword! Smith's skill is as impressive as ever. He probably only repaired it a few days ago, but the edge is as sharp as if it were newly forged!%% I was right to place faith in you. Thank you. Please accept this reward.
Where is the Lord's Sword?

I was wondering if I should give this to Vincent.%% I am glad you came to retrieve it. I wouldn't have minded if I weren't busy, but I am.%% Oh, I'm sorry if I held you up for too long. Here it is... Please give this sword to Jesse.%%
Shop in Desperation
Have you collected all of them yet? Oh... I'm desperately in a hurry.
Wow! Job well done! You've helped us immensely. How can I ever repay you?
Oh no... You haven't caught them all yet?

*Cough* Ah.. those dusts! Never-ending, painful dusts!!%% We are seriously short-handed right now. How about making some cleaning supplies for faster clean up? I love my smart brain.%% Could you help me out? We need a list of items.

What I would like to ask you to get is {C=0xFF016295/}15 Fluffy Fabrics{C=0xFF4D0D08/}.%% They drop from Sharpos that roam {C=0xFF016295/}Canyon of Oblivion{C=0xFF4D0D08/}.%% Please do us this favor! When our business is going well, we'll repay you handsomely!
Wow... I can't believe you turned me down...
You can't put anymore in the bag.
Milkyway Sanctuary - something skeletons
What's the matter?
Inventory is full. Please free some inventory space, then accept quest.
Averno's Famous Sword
What do you need?
Oh, you slew them all...! %% To tell you the truth, I was watching your progress from afar. Haha, G... Good!! Wait one moment. %%

This is the finest piece of workmanship I've ever done so far! There may never be a sword like this again! What do you think... Would you like to wield this sword? You two seem to be a perfect pair... %% Of course I can't just give it to you for free... You can't just handle such a perfectly crafted item without experience... %% So I was thinking.. How about you capture say, {C=0xFF016295/}12 Raccoons{C=0xFF4D0D08/} near around, and I'll think about it. What'd you think? Not bad right?
Great! Let's see how badly you want this sword!
Yeah? Oh well... I've certainly got nothing to lose, but I didn't see you as the cowardly sort. Anyway, I'll see you around! Take care of yourself!
It's not enough yet! I will have my eye on you. Do not even try to cheat me.
You can't proceed with a quest because your bag is full. Free up bag space before returning.
Averno in Dismay

H... Hey! %% (Alright! I'll just send them into more danger!)%% You didn't expect to get such a great sword for just that, did you? %% It certainly isn't enough! Alright!!%% There seems to be a stronger breed of Raccoons called {C=0xFF016295/}Pinkertons{C=0xFF4D0D08/} at {C=0xFF016295/}Canyon of Oblivion{C=0xFF4D0D08/}. Bring me {C=0xFF016295/}12{C=0xFF4D0D08/} of those, do you understand? %% Where can you find them? I'm not sure, but I figure they'd be somewhere deeper in the hills. %% You can do it right? I won't blame you if you quit.

You killed them all?!? What kind of.. Th..that's amazing!! %% (This is not looking too great for my health..I guess I have to give up something similar..woe is me..)%% well, the truth is..!!%% I am so sorry, kiddo! That sword is not mine, it is not what I can give as a reward!!%% I lied to you just for fun.. I didn't expect this situation. Sorry!! (Please don't hit me...)%% Are you sure? Are you forgiving me?%% Thank you!! Thank you!! %% Instead, to show my sincerity, Yes, I will give this to you.%% Now, it's very precious dust, so use it wisely.
The Final Obstacle Throwing Sharpo
Throwing Sharpo

(Great... I shouldn't have opened my big mouth! Should I just say that I misplaced it? No... I'd have to replace it with another one anyway. I should just make the errand more dangerous!! That's it!! Ha~!)%% Hahahaha!! Um... sorry about that, let me get you your sword... Huh? Oh no! The sword! it's gone! Where could it have gone possibly... ah ha! The {C=0xFF016295/}Throwing Sharpo{C=0xFF4D0D08/} must've come here while you were away catching Raccoons.%% I don't really remember clearly but it must be them! How about you go hunt for these suspicious {C=0xFF016295/}Throwing Sharpo{C=0xFF4D0D08/} while I look for the sword!!%% If you can't find it after killing {C=0xFF016295/}12 Throwing Sharpo{C=0xFF4D0D08/}, head back here! You can do that right?
If you can't find it after killing{C=0xFF016295/}12 Throwing Sharpo{C=0xFF4D0D08/}, come back! Good luck!
He wasn't there.
AWESOME! Looks delicious!! Monster, smart as Wookiboki must eat first. Thank you, %name%! Here! This is a token of my gratitude as promised. It's pretty expensive!!
Not yet huh? Look at my face color. It is getting green! Wookiboki will die because of hunger!!!

Wow~~ Food~~~ Delicious food~ Wookiboki just saw {C=0xFF016295/}Sharpo{C=0xFF4D0D08/} just passed by with a bag with fantastic smell. I want to have some Hehe~~%% I just heard what he called and he called it as {C=0xFF016295/}Emergency Rations{C=0xFF4D0D08/} supply! I want Emergency Rations too! %% Let's get it from Sharpo and share it with me. Will you? Hehe~
Thank you thank you~ %name% is great hero. Wookiboki is on diet right now, so I don't need much. I think.... {C=0xFF016295/}20 rations{C=0xFF4D0D08/} would be good for me.
Ah.... I am hungry...
You can't proceed with a quest because your bag is full. Free up bag space before returning.
I'm sorry, but would it be possible for you to hurry along now? I mean, since you've already agreed and all.%%There're all these reservations backed up, please don't feel bad, alright?
Woodies sometime come in handy.
Leaflet (Blossom)

Huh? We meet again! How've you been? Is everything alright? Sigh, with the rampant monsters crawling outside the village nowadays, lots of people are asking for healing potions!%% That's why I'm so busy now!!%% And I've run out of ingredients too, which is why I'm glad to see you!%% You know why? Because I know that you will do me a favor, right?%% I'd do it myself, but I just don't have the time! Would you mind getting {C=0xFF016295/}Leaflets{C=0xFF4D0D08/} for me?%% You can find {C=0xFF016295/}Leaflets{C=0xFF4D0D08/} from {C=0xFF016295/}Blossom{C=0xFF4D0D08/} at {C=0xFF016295/}Advanced Windia Plains [Mission Mode]{C=0xFF4D0D08/}.

Thanks, you'll be well compensated from your troubles!%% I need 5 leaves, that shouldn't be too tough. You can find them from {C=0xFF016295/}Blossom{C=0xFF4D0D08/} at the {C=0xFF016295/}Advanced Windia Plains [Mission Mode]{C=0xFF4D0D08/}.%% I'll be waiting for you, {C=0xFF016295/}%name%{C=0xFF4D0D08/}.
Greenies, the Thorniest of the Lot
Thorned Leaf (Greenie)

Oh no! I can't believe I forgot about the {C=0xFF016295/}Thorned Leaves{C=0xFF4D0D08/}! I need those as well! I'm sorry to trouble you further, but...%% The only way to get {C=0xFF016295/}Thorned Leaves{C=0xFF4D0D08/} is from those {C=0xFF016295/}Greenies{C=0xFF4D0D08/}, and believe me, they're rough! I don't fight well either... You think you can do this one more time?%% I mean, if you're not busy, you know?

Wow! Thanks! {C=0xFF016295/}Greenies{C=0xFF4D0D08/} should roam around the {C=0xFF016295/}Advanced Windia Plain{C=0xFF4D0D08/} [Mission Mode]. Please bring me {C=0xFF016295/}5 Thorned Leaves{C=0xFF4D0D08/}. And be careful of those Greenies, they're rough!
Wow~ I can't believe you gathered them this quick %name%! You're wonderful!
Wha... what?%% Could you please reconsider?
You can't proceed with a quest because your bag is full. Free up bag space before returning.
When a Man Loves a Woman...
You haven't left yet... Please make haste. Godspeed.

What's this? Eh? This...??%% Ah... ahh... ahhh... ah-choo!!!%% Ah-choo!%% Darn it!%% Who sent these flowers? I don't know who... But they wanted me to suffer knowing I'm allergic to them!%% If I get my hands on the person... I'll... You know what? I don't like you either! Hrmph!
Flower Delivery to Amy

Ah..? Dear %class%. When were you here???%% Actually I am a man in love. I like her a lot, and she likes cute, fuzzy critters too...%% But I'm really clueless about how I should express my feelings for her. Captain Colin told me that flowers are the best, so I've been sending flowers for days.%% I wonder if it's because I've been sending bouquets anonymously... She's been wondering about me lately...%% I need a hand getting some flowers to her today as well. Could you give this flower to her, if you're not busy... Please?

Thanks so much! Her name is {C=0xFF016295/}Amy{C=0xFF4D0D08/}.You can find her in the {C=0xFF016295/}middle of Port of the Winds{C=0xFF4D0D08/}.%% Oh and one more thing... Please... Don't tell her that I'm the one who sent it. I'll be counting on you.
Could you please reconsider?
You're looking for a pet? Please go ahead~!
You can't proceed with a quest because your bag is full. Free up bag space before returning.
You haven't left yet? The Crabbies are near the Bearded Whale Coast and Nautilus Port. Please hurry.
Clearing Crabbies
Crabby

Hello! Aren't you %name%? You were the one who helped me before. I thought it was you! Did you know that people are getting together to rid the {C=0xFF016295/}Crabbies{C=0xFF4D0D08/} at {C=0xFF016295/}Bearded Whale Coast{C=0xFF4D0D08/}?%% I'm only a bank teller but, %name% the %class% is renowned for bravery. You think you can help us kill these {C=0xFF016295/}Crabbies{C=0xFF4D0D08/} off? If you help us, the bank will gladly offer a special reward.
Thank you!! {C=0xFF016295/}12 Crabbies{C=0xFF4D0D08/} at {C=0xFF016295/}Bearded Whale Coast{C=0xFF4D0D08/} ought to do it! I know you'll be a great help, %name%.
Defeat Starry
You haven't gotten them all yet? I need 20 Baby Starries! I'll be waiting right here until you are done!! Good luck!
Baby Starry

Huh! Hello %class%. Are you the %class% who has come to join the fellowship? Oh! Yes you are! I'm really sorry about the last time. %class%, I'm sorry to ask you this all of a sudden but we seem to have a situation over at {C=0xFF016295/}Bearded Whale Coast{C=0xFF4D0D08/} with the sudden appearance of so many {C=0xFF016295/}Starries{C=0xFF4D0D08/}. %%We've been gathering people to take care of it at {C=0xFF016295/}Port of Wind{C=0xFF4D0D08/}, but so few of us are capable of fighting. Everybody's doing what they can, but they could sure use a %class% like you over there!%% If you can spare some time, do you think you can help with the effort to rid these {C=0xFF016295/}Starries{C=0xFF4D0D08/}?

You will? That's great. Thank you. If you could just {C=0xFF016295/}Kill the Starries{C=0xFF4D0D08/} and bring the {C=0xFF016295/}Baby Starries{C=0xFF4D0D08/} to me so I could stop this! I'll be waiting here for you.
Could you please reconsider?
One... Two... Wow!! I'm amazed!%% I've never seen anyone gather Baby Starries this quick before, this must be a record!!%% Thank you again. This is a small token of my appreciation.
Ah... Please hurry. My son should be waiting.
Oh dear... I don't think you should be losing the letter like that. Here you go. Take care.

Welcome! My name is Rudolf and I trade beer at Port of Winds.%% Why am I here you asked? Well, I'm here to serve free beer for Thomas and the soldiers who are working really hard for our continent.%% Could I get you some beer as well?%% What's this!? This is a letter from me mother! How did her letter get into your hands? %% Ah...%class%, you were sent by Mother!! Thank you! I was just wondering how she's been doing too... You have my thanks yet again!
Wot's the matter, 'ere to swig a mug o' ale eh?
Deliver a letter to Rudolph at Traitor's Ridge

Welcome, dear. Want some wine? Or want to listen my story? The youngest boy of mine... He's too far away to visit me and you remind me of him somehow...%% Anyway, my oldest boy, {C=0xFF016295/}Rudolph{C=0xFF4D0D08/} helps this old mommy a lot.%% But recently this work gets tougher and tougher... Speaking of which, do you think you can help an old lady out?
Thank you. My son lives at the {C=0xFF016295/}Port of the Winds{C=0xFF4D0D08/}. Can you deliver this letter to my son {C=0xFF016295/}Rudolph{C=0xFF4D0D08/}?
Won't you reconsider your decision? It would break an old lady's heart...
You can't proceed with a quest because your bag is full. Free up bag space before returning.
Ah! This is Colin's Class Promotion Approval!
Class Promotion has not been accepted.
Oh yeah? Well, that was unexpected. I hope you made the right decision.
You bag is full. You are unable to continue a quest. Please empty your bag and come back to me.
Ah! This is Colin's Class Promotion Approval!
Ah! This is Colin's Class Promotion Approval!
Ah! This is Colin's Class Promotion Approval!
Ah! This is Colin's Class Promotion Approval!
Ah! This is Colin's Class Promotion Approval!
Ah! This is Colin's Class Promotion Approval!
Ah! This is Colin's Class Promotion Approval!

Those reckless, violent Woodsmen! How dare they fell these trees!%% This tree is very precious to me. It has provided for me unconditionally! I was about to build a house with this tree, and now this!%% Oh... If I were 10 years younger, I'd not even break a sweat taking care of 17 or more Woodsmen!
Really, you can do that? Thank you. Take care of 40 Violent Woodsmen who cut the trees around here!
Oh, you can't do it? I guess you got no guts. If I were younger by 10 years, I wouldn't need to ask you this favor. I guess I expected too much. You be on your way now.
Benevolent Tree
Reed Swamp
Slay 20 Violent Woodsmen
You wiped them out! Thank you. They won't come back again!%% This is your reward. You take care, good bye~.
Not done yet? Well, hurry and take care of 20 Violent Woodsmen. I'll be waiting.

Hello {C=0xFF016295/}%name%{C=0xFF4D0D08/}! %% At our bank, we not only handle our customers' money, but their valuables as well.%% Due to the increase in monster sightings though, a lot of people are asking for their valuables and weapons. So it's been so hectic here. %% There is an important cargo that must be delivered today and maybe a {C=0xFF016295/}%class%{C=0xFF4D0D08/} like yourself can help me out?

Thank you for accepting this job. There isn't much to do around here,%% apart from delivering cargo to the villagers. Of course, I'll reward you for the work.%% First, you can deliver this to Daisy. I'll see you when you come back.
Well, I understand. I guess I need to find someone else for the job. Sorry, I have to go.
You haven't gone yet? Our business depends on keeping customers' promises. Please hurry and go!
Hello? Ah, did Sofia send you? Wow, thank you! Please give her my regards. Goodbye.
Job well done. Here it is. The second shipment needs to be sent out soon, hold on.
Please deliver this promptly.
Cargo Delivery (1)
Cargo Delivery (2)
Cargo Delivery (3)
Hello? Ah, did Sofia send you? Why didn't you bring me my cargo? Are you the one who Sofia sent for me? Then why didn't you bring me my thing?
This is the second shipment cargo that needs to be delivered to Guard Walter. He works here. You'll deliver it, right?
Thank you. Please take special in handling the fragile cargo.
Oh, really? Then there's nothing I can do... Farewell.
What is this stuff?%% Hmm... we don't accept bribes, but if you insist...%% Ah! That's mine! This came from the bank, I see. Thank you, tell them I'll frequent them as I always do. Take care!
Do you need anything from me? Anyway, why isn't my cargo from the bank here yet?
Thank you on a job well done. Here is your reward. There is a last shipment left. Please hold on.
Hasn't it been sent yet? Please hurry.
This will be the last shipment. This one goes to Cyndi.
Oh, what a pity. But I understand if you don't want to do this. I'm more than satisfied with your help so far. Goodbye.
Yes, then I'll be counting on you. This looks like some kind of weapon, so please be careful not to hurt yourself.
You haven't delivered it yet? You're going to do it soon... right?
Who are you? You have something for me? Otherwise, buzz off!

What are you? Huh? This is mine, what are you doing? Are you stealing it? Huh? What? You came from the bank?%% Look at you, you look like a thief, well, give it to me. Tell them thank you for the job.
You completed your deliveries!%% Thank you, you've helped me a lot! Here is the reward, and this is your bonus!%% Thank you, and goodbye!
What is this? Who are you? What's going on?
You can't proceed with a quest because your bag is full. Free up bag space before returning.

It looks like there're a lot of monsters roaming around town these days. It's rather mysterious, but at least it has increased the demand for armors.%% You know what though... I don't know whether to be happy or sad. Either way, I'm beyond short-handed over here. So I was thinking...%% You think, maybe, you can get me some {C=0xFF016295/}Tough Sheepskin{C=0xFF4D0D08/}? Leather armor orders are pouring in and I need some help.%% If you help me out, I'll gladly make you an awesome armor too! How about it?

There're some vicious {C=0xFF016295/}Sheep{C=0xFF4D0D08/} wandering not too far from here.%% I'm sure they drop what you need. I don't think I need too many for now. {C=0xFF016295/}10 Tough Sheepskin{C=0xFF4D0D08/} ought to do it. Alright! I'll be waiting!
Ah, is that so? Hahaha, I was just fooling around. Haha... %% Drat! Why doesn't this thing work?! Come on!!
Welcome, you came with the hard leather I asked of you? I heard it's quite hard to get... Oh well, do let me know when you get it.
You got them all already? Okay, as promised, here's your armor.%% I'll be asking for your help again soon enough, but I'm good currently, thank you, and goodbye..
Decker Shark Piers
Silence of the Lambs
Tough Sheepskin
You can't proceed with a quest because your bag is full. Free up bag space before returning.

Oh %class%! Will you listen to me?%% There is a plot of land that my family has been farming on for years at {C=0xFF016295/}Windia Plains [Arcade Mode(F1)]{C=0xFF4D0D08/}. I've been hearing some strange noises lately, and I went out to check one of those nights. Turns out those pesky {C=0xFF016295/}Stumpies{C=0xFF4D0D08/} are trampling all over the land!! %% Do you think there's a way you can take care of these annoying {C=0xFF016295/}Stumpies{C=0xFF4D0D08/} for me? Is this possible, sir?

Thank you! My farm is located around the {C=0xFF016295/}Empty Pumpkin Garden(Mission Map) in Windia Plains [Arcade Mode(F1)]{C=0xFF4D0D08/} area.%% It's easy to find, what with all those {C=0xFF016295/}Stumpies{C=0xFF4D0D08/} trotting around. If you can take care of 7 {C=0xFF016295/}Stumpies{C=0xFF4D0D08/}, I will compensate for your troubles.
Oh, not yet? Of course, of course... these things take time. But, my family are counting on you sire. Please hurry.%% Otherwise these {C=0xFF016295/}Stumpies{C=0xFF4D0D08/} will be the end my family.
You got rid of them! You have my thanks!%% I feel safer tilling the field again.%% This is not a just enough reward, but I hope you'll accept it. I hope all is well with you.
Of course... This task isn't easy. I see, farewell.

How's your life recently? Good? Great! Cuz I was looking for %class%~ This place looks like a regular inn from outside, but it actually is a shelter for orphans as well. Since I grew up as one, so I know what they are going through. Poor things...%% I may not be a big help to them, but at least I can provide them with lodgings and food. %% Every time I see them with bright, big smiles plastered on their faces, I feel gratified. The recent monster attacks cause me worry for the children. I need to obtain extra food supplies for them.%% But I can't go looking for food right now... If it is not too much to ask of you, could you help me gather food for them?

Thank you very much. Let me give you a list then.%% I need {C=0xFF016295/}10 Broken Armor{C=0xFF4D0D08/} so I can buy woods for the fire, {C=0xFF016295/}10 Bandaged Bones{C=0xFF4D0D08/} and {C=0xFF016295/}10 Bones{C=0xFF4D0D08/} so I can make something to eat for my children.%% I trust you will help us through this.
Do you have the food yet? I don't want to rush you, but the children really need them. You take care of yourself too.

Wow! You managed to gather all the good! You're wonderful! Please accept this as a token of my thanks. I appreciate your effort.%% God bless you. Now, I must go and cook. Please come back again, if you feel hungry. Goodbye.
Voluntary Work (1)
Broken Armor
Bandaged Bone
Really now... There must be some other way... I'll see you another time then.

Listen, have you seen a jewel around here?%% I don't know what to do anymore.%% I'm a miner, you see. Not too long ago, I happened to dig up an {C=0xFF016295/}Emerald{C=0xFF4D0D08/}. It was the kind of luck I've never had my whole life!%% But my joy was brief. I dropped it while fleeing from a monster.%% I've been trying to find it, but I'm terrible in combat. I'm afraid I'll get killed. You look like you can handle yourself. Will you help me out? I'll compensate you of course.

Thank you so much! I dropped the Emerald somewhere in {C=0xFF016295/}Valid Raeth{C=0xFF4D0D08/}, so you can start your search there. It's possible that one of the monsters picked it up too. I'm counting on you, please help!
What? Please reconsider! *Sniff* *Sniff* My family is anxiously awaiting my return...
You haven't found it yet? That worries me. I can't lose it... oh my god.
This is it! You found it! This is mine for sure! Thank you very much! How could I ever repay you?! Thank you again!! *Sniff* *Sniff* *Sniff*
Lost Emerald
Valid Raeth
Road of Meetings
Not yet? You can't get into {C=0xFF016295/}[Arcade Mode(F1)] at Traitor's Ridge{C=0xFF4D0D08/}? Time is running out... please hurry.
Wow! You got rid of them all? Then we can go and see our mother? %% Thank you so much! Oh yeah, this is something very dear to me, but I'll give to you.%% I'll never forget what you've done~.

You are the %class% who recently delivered my mom's letter, right? Yes! Thanks to %class%, I will meet her at {C=0xFF016295/}[Arcade Mode(F1)] at Traitor's Ridge{C=0xFF4D0D08/}.%% I'm glad to be able to see my mother finally, but I'm also worried about the hearsay of monsters lurking around those parts.%% I know you've done so much for us already... so if you don't mind, I would like to request to you, %class%. %% Could you {C=0xFF016295/}defeat Sangka{C=0xFF4D0D08/} of [Arcade Mode(F1)] at Traitor's Ridge, so my mother can make safe passage?%% Is that possible?
Wow! Really? Thank you so much! If Sangka is gone, my mother should be able to traverse safe and sound.
Is it really that hard? Could you please reconsider?
What're you doing here? Can you hurry and get rid of those {C=0xFF016295/}Wolves{C=0xFF4D0D08/}? I'm sick of them.
You took care of them all? Really? So you did... The {C=0xFF016295/}Wolves{C=0xFF4D0D08/} are so quiet now. Amazing!!%% Now that's a job well done lad! Here's your fee!! Thanks! Bye!
You can't do it? What can I do then?! Bah!

Yes! Please take care of it!! {C=0xFF016295/}Brown Wolves{C=0xFF4D0D08/} will be around the {C=0xFF016295/}Windia Plains{C=0xFF4D0D08/}. Make {C=0xFF016295/}Brown Wolves{C=0xFF4D0D08/} get scared by slaying {C=0xFF016295/}7 {C=0xFF4D0D08/} of them for me. I'm counting on you.

Darn {C=0xFF016295/}Wolves{C=0xFF4D0D08/}!! I'm sure you've heard those {C=0xFF016295/}Ash Wolves{C=0xFF4D0D08/} showing up at {C=0xFF016295/}Windia Plains{C=0xFF4D0D08/} right behind my house, right?%% These pesky canines howl all night and it drives me crazy! I can't sleep!! And that's not all!!%% They try to break my doors down and when that didn't work, they ate all my chickens in the coop!!%% I was wondering if you could go by deep within Windia Plains and quiet some of those {C=0xFF016295/}Ash Wolves{C=0xFF4D0D08/}?
Wolves' Lure
Brown Wolves

This kind of recession is terrible for a boatman like me. I think I might be better off making a living as a fisherman than a boatman these days.%% Do you know that using {C=0xFF016295/}Scrappies and Spees to make bait will get you the most fish{C=0xFF4D0D08/}? %% It's not too easy for a man who sits all day and rows boats.%% If... you're not too busy, you think you can help me out? I'll assure you that it won't be a waste of your time.

Thanks.. If you hang around {C=0xFF016295/}Traitor's Ridge{C=0xFF4D0D08/}, you will be able to find the {C=0xFF016295/}Scrappies{C=0xFF4D0D08/}. Please bring me {C=0xFF016295/}10 Bat Nose{C=0xFF4D0D08/}.%% I'll be waiting for you.

Well done, you're now a Ranger. You managed to be promoted unconditionally this time. It will not be so the next.%% You must not allow complacence to infect your mind, for this is only the beginning.%% Remember, relentless training is the key to survival. I'll see you later then!

It's good to see you again! So how is the life here? Good?%% The bounty hunter traffic has made this once peaceful village crowded and noisy again.%% Actually the Archer's Odellia used to be a very quiet place. There were 4 aristocrats who ran this village once.%% These 4 people were trying hard to make the place .more abundant than the Port of Wind which is in charge of all trades and administration.%% However, 50 years ago, that trust became broken because of the war with Elga, the Lord of Darkness. That's why this village split into four pieces. And the person who set up the location for hunters was my father, Adelpio.%% He handed his business over to me some time ago. I accept job offers that will help this village out of its slums once again.%% My business runs from Windia Plains, and extends far to Libra.%% I obtain a commission fee when I find people to carry out my jobs. How about it? You want to take my job offer?

Since this is your first time, I'll give you an easy job.%% Everyday, I get some food from Huerin, the general merchant. But she doesn't deliver food, so I have to make the trip myself. It bothers me.%% Bring me one piece of cake from him.
You'll know you can't do anything without my help.
My stomach's been growling all day long. Bring me that cake, hurry!

Hello~, haven't seen you around here.%% Nice to meet you. I'm Huerin from a very far country called {C=0xFF016295/}Shutyomouf{C=0xFF4D0D08/}.%% What do you need from me? %% Ah, you came for Adelio's cake?%% Here it is! This is the most popular item from my hometown, Shutyomouf! Please deliver this to Adelio~.
I can't help but be impressed at its taste every time I eat this Shutyomouf cake, yumyum! This is how to live life! Want to give it a try?

Promotions and reputation are what they are focused on. So stupid, haha.%% No matter, our business is booming. Now, listen to me carefully. I'm about to give you golden advice about earning money easily. Money comes in the currencies of gold, silver and copper.%% The most precious is gold, then silver, and lastly copper. Begging can net you some easy gold.%% Try to look as pitiful as possible, then look as scruffy as you can, limp on one leg, and stretch your hand out. But hey, anything to strike it rich, right?%% Next best method is to work hard and earn some honest coin. So if you don't want to beg, you should accept my job offer.
The weather here's being really weird lately. It's been snowing recently.%% The demand for fleece is very high all of sudden. Bring me 10 Fleeces, and I'll reward you handsomely.

If the snow stops, the fleece will be useless. Hurry up and go get me fleece.
I can't give you a nice reward because the price of fleece has dropped. Hurry up.

That I said it seems like someone provoked Hookah and Alvida.%% The fact that Hookah and Alvida showed up at the port all the sudden, and because of the fact that they attacked into this Port of the Wind which they know for sure that it is known to be closely guarded.%% When I questioned their followers, there was someone behind it as I expected. The soldiers who left here doesn't know the usage of the cannon. Like no one knows. Soldiers with guide to use cannons are all missing.%% If you look around the place where they went missing, you might find out some clues. Can you look into that place?

Missing soldiers were last seen in the 22nd floor of Drakos. If you go there, you might trace something.%% Find out about the soldiers are important as well but more importantly, we need the guide to use the cannons. You will get those guide of the cannons by slaying monsters there.
That instruction manual can save many soldier's lives. It's a shame.
Time is of the essence, Make haste.
So, this is the instruction manual. It seems difficult to understand, but the boys at research will figure it out.%% Thanks.
Cannon Instruction Manual
Instruction Manual for the Cannon (2)

We finally figure out something about the Cannon, thanks to your help on finding that instruction manual for the cannon. However, we are missing some parts according to the guide of the cannons%% According to our soldier, you can get those parts from monsters on the 35th floor of Drakos You been there before, right?%% I think you'll find it faster than anyone because you know there. Can you get us these parts on the list from 35th floor of Drakos?
I'm sure that the monsters in the 35th floor have them. Those mechanical monsters would surely have some interest in such things.%% 10 Cannon Parts will do it, so please hurry.
This is not right! Will you disregard your responsibility!
Please hurry.
I knew I can count on you! A job well done!
Cannon Part
Finding Medicine

You know there are many soldiers went missing here, right? Yes, there been a big accident that darkness swallowed lost of soldiers by attack of Witch Paris. From that time, we've been inactive because there are only few left. You said you are later Dragon Fellowship?%% You must help us here with many different errands. First, we need materials to heal our soldiers. Nurse you see there, Mimi, taking care of all the soldiers by herself is impossible.

There these things called Angry Grim Master Hermes at Drakos 14th Fl. They have medicine that can heal the monsters very quickly so that they can be sent out again.%% Recently, I got to test it and it seems to work on us humans too.%% Bring 50 of those Remedy of Hermes to me.
I know you're better than this..
The injured are increasing as we speak. Please hurry.
Good. This should help heal the badly injured right away. You did good.
Remedy of Hermes
Mining Area
Couple/Married Couple
Kundara Dungeon
Making the ultimate weapon!

You were the one who defeated Lavalon not so long ago? Then I'll give you very useful information%% I've been tracing dragons who disappeared from the face of earth thousands years ago because I want to produce this weapon called Dragon Soulate.%% But only thing that was helpful or useful was canine of dragon. Nothing else. No matter what I do with this canine, this is only a piece bone, that's it.%% In order to bring the power into this bone of dragon, I need the dragon heart that is the original source of power and 100 of Granite Ores to train that.%% I want to get a strong weapon and you want to get the strong power. How about it?%% Will you work with me?

Okay! Lavalon might be a fake dragon%% However, with that heart, I can test how much power I can pull out from that.%% It won't be not as strong as the real dragon's heart, I know. It would be the best weapon for a adventurer like you!%% Lavalon's destiny doesn't kill him within the lava! Even you've defeated him, he would be recovered by now.%% Bring me the 1 healthy heart of Lavalon and 100 of Granites. Then I'll make you the strongest weapon you've ever known!
The weapon I want to make will require your help. I can't help it if you refuse though..
C'mon! let's get a move on!

Huh! You got it!%% Wait%% (drumming and twanging!)%% ...%% ...%% (drumming and twanging!)%% Here! Completed! Get this! Free of charge! My wish was to make strongest weapon!%% Most important fact was that I made this weapon! Take good care of this weapon and use it usefully.
Healthy Heart of Lavalon
Defeat Sangka [Scenario Mode(F5)]
Continent of Wind
Ha! So you really defeated Hookah huh? That's spectacular! Here, this is one of my favorite weapon!!%% Good, Good!!!!!
I've heard you were successful in defeating Hookah. That's very impressive. %class%, I will give you reward as promised.
Your back from defeating Hookah? Really? Nice job!%% Hey. Take this. Hmm.. Now, it is time for Alvida. Shall we?
Lost prescience (1)

I was raised to be a shaman to predict the future of Mika tribe. Since our chief is absent, whole tribe is depending on me.%% That is because maybe not as much as chief, but I do understand the language of the Dragon lord. But...%% Since we lost chief, the prescience became so weak. We need to go through the ritual to bring back the prescience...%% There are many who disturb the ritual around here. We are short handed.%% We would appreciate your assistant. Will you help us?
First, we need to defeat monsters around here. Please defeat 20 of bush spiders
Our future getting so unclear. What should we do?
Please take care of yourself
You came back safely. But it will get harder, now is only beginning of that.

{T=FTcts_13/C=0xFFA62700/}[Quest Requirements]{T=QTtext/C=0xFF4D0D08/} Defeat 20 of Bush Spiders
{T=FTcts_13/C=0xFFA62700/}[Quest NPC]{T=QTtext/C=0xFF4D0D08/} - Pine Cone Hills - Naoi
{T=FTcts_13/C=0xFFA62700/}[Detail]{T=QTtext/C=0xFF4D0D08/} Need to defeat 20 of Bush Spiders in order to return Naoi's prescience. Bush Spiders can be found around Pine Cone Hills.
Bush Spider
Lost prescience (2)

I can feel that more power within me which I couldn't get before because of bush spider. I need to spread this source of power within my body, and in order to do that, I need to drink tea made from pine needle.%% I need not regular pine needle, but the pine needle from the herbivore which they chew then spit out.%% Can you find me 50 of those?

Flying Squirrel is maybe the only one herbivore around here. They don't eat pine needle itself, but they eat them with pines.%% If you defeat them, you'll get pine needles they chew then spit out.%% Then we'll get ready to make the tea. Find us 50 of sticky pine needles.
Our future getting so unclear. What should we do?
Could you hurry up please
This will be enough. Please wait.
Sticky pine needles
Lost prescience (3)

Now, I can feel the power is spreading all over my body. I guess can use prescience up to certain point.%% However, this is just not enough to predict the clear future of ours.%% Prescience is about reflection of clear soul and mind, and in order to see the reflection, we need to get purified crystal.%% But a place like this is almost impossible to get purified crystal. We need some kind of replacement.%% There are many flying squirrels. What's so special about them is that they dig hole to pine tree and make marble out of pine resin then dry them.%% They use them when they cook special stew.%% If we can get that pine resin marbles, we could melt them and make them into clear pine resin crystal.

We need high temperature fire in order to melt the pine resin. The only person who own the fire that could melt the pine resin is Rugor.%% Since he is just a blacksmith, so we are not sure how he could control the pine resin, but I am sure he can do it.%% Pine resin is not that big, so we need at least 40 of them.%% Get 40 of pine resin and go to Rugor.
Our future getting so unclear. What should we do?
Could you hurry up please
What is this? Oh? This is pine resin. Why you giving these to me? Huh?
Pine Resin Marble
Lost prescience (4)

From this pine resin marbles, you want me to make pine resin crystal? I guess Naoi trusted me too much. Hahaha!%% Fine! I guess this cannot be that different from the melted irons I handle all the time! What I need to do is to melt and hardening it again!%% I used to enjoy art of glass, so I guess I can do it! haha%% But I got one problem. This pine resin got too much foreign substances.%% I need to purify this by melting it with high temperature fire, but I need bowl to contain melted pine resin.%% I can't make that bowl, maybe a replacement can be found... I don't think we can find bowl like that around here%% There are Toenail Wing Kinsman and they wear gas mask.%% What about the gas mask? If we cannot get the clean bowl, then why not just get clean melted pine resin to begin with.%% We can get that through purifying filter from gas mask they wear! What do you think? There's a problem. Toenail Wing Patrol disappeared from this area.%% Hmm, but I heard that Ribibits usually swallow Gas masks. I think we need to find out them.

Well, I think one filter won't be enough to purify all 40 pine resin marbles. Pine resin will melt the filter.%% I think 3 pine resin marbles per one filter. That's.. %% Hmm.. Well, just bring me 20 of gas masks!
If you don't bring me those gas mask, I'll just put these pine resin into the fire!
My patience doesn't last long. You better hurry up, hurry hurry!

Ah! I must underestimated you. I wasn't sure if you could bring it, but you did.%% I guess you are naïve, you could just bring me the filter.. You brought me more work. I'll take care of this. You sit there and wait.
Toenail Wing Gas mask
Lost prescience (5)
I don't know what this filter made of. It doesn't come off! Do I need to cut it? In order to dissemble this gas mask, I need something very sharp.. Blade Woodman's Saw will work%% Bring me that!
I have 20 gas masks.. And I guess 10 saw will do. Bring me 10 blade Woodman's saw!
If you don't bring me those saws, I'll throw this pine resin marble into the fire!
My patience doesn't last long. You better hurry up, hurry hurry!
Good! This will work. Wait and see.
Blade Woodman's Saw
Lost prescience (6)

Now! I got the purified pine resin and size of this will make good pine resin crystal!%% However, I need something more to make that crystal. Hmm! What I need is that ice water in order to cool down fast.%% Melted iron is different story, and regular temperature water will do. But this won't work like that. I need really cool water with ice in it.%% In order to make really clear crystal, I need to cool down the marble really fast. Of course, this is my first try too.%% If this is something similar to the art of glass, what I am saying must be true. That's why I need ice. You got that?

I know ice is hard to get around here. That's why we buy the ice.%% You see Syamalky there? He sells ice bags. I know I should pay for those ice bags, and I do agree that's the way it should be.%% I am broke, haha. I'll pay back to you when I'm done with this, so why don't you spend your money to buy those ice bags? 10 ice bags will be enough, hahaha!
Whatever! What can I do with this resin stuff? I'll just throw away!
What! Melted pine resin is getting hardened again! If I melt this again, there will be more foreign substances!%% Hurry and go buy before too late!
Good! I can prepare cool water with this ice. Wait, I'll make really clear crystal%% Haha! I am excited to do something like art of glass again, haha.
Ice Bag
Lost prescience (7)

Hey, Look at this! I did well, look at this excellent crystal%% It was a good experience for me. Hahah! I wasn't sure if I could make crystal from the pine resin. I am surprised myself.%% Now, you can deliver this crystal to Naoi. You started it, so you end it, right?
Take this. Are you done after you deliver this to Naoi?%% Take this and deliver.
Man, I just want to break this pine resin marble!
Hurry and deliver! I expect Naoi's prescience for our future.
Oh.. Rugor can be a hard to handle but his skill is the real thing. This looks more clear than the one I used to use%% With this clear crystal, I am sure I can read our future without problem.
Pine Resin Crystal
Lost prescience (8)

Now we got the crystal. But having crystal doesn't mean I can read the future.%% This is just regular crystal without any kind of power within.%% We need to put spell on this crystal to work. First, we need poison to purify this crystal.%% Deadly poison will destroy all sort of impure substances. Can you find me the poison?

I know where you can get the poison. Defeat Poisonous Mushroom monsters and bring me the spore bags out of their body. Impure substances hold strong power even if they are small ones.%% That's why we need many spore bags. Bring me 30 of them.
You must be busy.
I'll take good care of this Crystal. I'll be counting on you.
The poison is very strong. Carefully give to me.
Spore Bag
Lost prescience (9)

The Spore Bags you brought me wasn't the one I can use as it is. I need to condensify this by putting them into the bottle gourd.%% I need some time to do that. Will you wait? Maybe you can do other shores then come back.
We have to head for Misty Lane if this is finished. Please defeat monsters around for safe way.%% I will finish my job soon.
You must be busy.
While you do your thing, I'll finish my work.
While you were away, I am done with my work. Please wait.
Misty Lane Monster
Lost prescience (10)
I am not done with condensifying the spore bags. I guess I can use it but just in case, I must try harder.%% While I am on it, could you defeat monsters again?

Since we are only small number of people for scouting, we must be ready for anything around the monsters.%% I know, no matter what we do, we'll eventually hit the limit.%% Staying at one place is very dangerous but I guess we have no choice. We heard Hook Woodsman is cut down the tree randomly%% Could you defeat 20 of those blade woodsmen. While then, I'll purify this crystal.
Please reconsider. Why you want to waste time just waiting around.
You came back already? I didn't finish my work yet...%% I guess you didn't go yet, %class% You should go now.

You came back. While you were away, I finished purifying the crystal%% I believe we just need to finish up. I just need to check if this crystal work as we want it to be. After I try to read the future, I'll let you know what you have to do %class%, you just need to carry out what I tell you.%% I'll try the simple kind first..... %% I think I got it. Someone named Pablo in Libra. Take this scroll.%% This is for your next mission and I give you in advance that you'll need it.
Hook Woodsman
Lost prescience (11)
Use the scroll I gave you to go to see Pablo in Libra.%% He'll show you the way. How about it? Will you go?
Do you have the Libra Return Scroll I gave you? You can use it to go to Libra without problem. Bring me back the message from Pablo.%% Then I'll know whether reading the future works or not.
Confirmation would help... Anyways, thank you for all your help.
I'll be waiting for you here.
What is this? You need something from me?
Talk to Pablo
Lost prescience (12)
What? Naoi want to get answer from this old man? Sure, what can I do?%% Let me hear it.

Huh? I should ask you to do something for me which might be urgent for me? Hmm... let's see%% Oh, yes. I caught a cold and been sick lately. Can you get me the cold medicine?%% I lost cold medicine while collecting information at the Valid Raeth. I think one of monster there got my medicine.%% If you start to defeat monsters, you can probably find my medicine.
Why you stop before finish the sentence.. Got me curious
Hmm.. I'll be counting on you. This cold is bad one.. Cough~!
Ah~ I am glad I got back this expensive medicine and feel lucky I don't have to buy one again! Hahaha~
Super Ultra Cold Relief Pill
Serious Advice
Hmm~ this is fresh air. I didn't know when I had a cold.%% All because of you, I can breath now. I'll grant one wish from you. If you need anything, let me know.

Naoi want to know whether her power of reading the future is fully recovered or not, huh? I don't know how she know I know the answer to that.%% Give this to Naoi. This is psychokinetic Meter which measure the Psycho kinesis.%% Once I wondered how much Psycho kinesis I can still exercise. New technology really helped me solve the question.%% Isn't it ironic? Here, take this. Bring this to Naoi, the shaman.%% I don't need it anymore.
Well, I got over the cold, so I am satisfied. Haha~!
I guess I said all. Bring my message to Naoi.
Hm.. I didn't know there is measurement machine like this. I am amazed.%% I think we got rid of our one big problem. Thank you very much.
Talk to Naoi
Absurd suggestion

Hey, little one. You think you got the potential, huh?%% I think a person who doesn't have the potential need to try at all since no one will recognize that.%% You want me to approve you? Then show me what you got.

Okay, I'll give you credit for your attempt to get approval from me. But I'll bet all my money that you can't achieve PvP 1 win!%% If you come back after 1 win, then I'll give you all my asset! What are my asset?%% This chest, here it is! I didn't open yet but once opened, you can earn one item randomly.%% I think you might have some too. This is not a usual chest, it is rare gold chest! hehe!%% Then show me 1 win! My opinion dominate that you can't do it. huhu
Huh! You don't think you should prove yourself to me? Who do you think I am!
What? You don't have confidence?
Ah! I can't believe.. I'll.. Give you the.. Chest...%% But.. But! Next time! Then I'll challenge you!%% No, no, I'll accept your challenge again! Next time!
PvP 1 win
Secure retreat route (1)

My mistake and misunderstanding. Sorry. My name is Shangdor.%% Yes. I am one of Mika Tribe. Do you know why we are here?%% Not long ago, our tribe had big battle. Because of the battle, lots of our people was infected by disease. To heal ourselves, we've asked for forecast. %% And as per forecast, few of us came out to Continent of Wind to wake up Good Dragon.%% Of course our final target is not here. Thus, we have to leave Pine Cone Hills soon. Well, I can tell you details later, but what we need now is escape road first. %% I hope you are good one as Gordon described.

If you can help us, that is truly a good news for us. Good. What we need now most is to defeat those monsters around here. %% I will add my hand too, please start to defeat them now. 50 will do, I think.
If you don't like it, nothing I can do.
Hurry and go.
Good job. But I guess we still got a problem.
Pine Cone Hills Monster (Field)
Secure retreat route (2)
There are still danger of poisonous mushrooms. Have you seen Poison Mushroom??%% They are vicious. I am worried.

If you can work on it one more time, really appreciate that. Please defeat 50 of Poison Mushroom.%% You know where they are, right? They are in Misty Lane. Well I know it is bothering to go back where you were before, but please help me.
If you don't like it, nothing I can do.
Hurry and go.
Good job. But I guess we still got a problem.
Poison Mushroom
Secure retreat route (3)
I believe the danger of poisonous mushroom disappeared... There are still more danger.%% Will you take this problem seriously?
Around there, there are flying Squirrels. They are after our food supplies again and again whenever they get chance.%% defeat 40 of them to draw the line for them not to touch our food anymore.
If you don't like it, nothing I can do.
Hurry and go.
Work well done. But unfortunately, we do have more problem on our hand.
Woods Flying Squirrel
Secure retreat route (4)

Most of the danger issues disappeared but.. There is someone who must know what we are going through.%% Can you deliver our message to Hunter G who will be on the road to Collapsed Sanctuary from Pine Cone Hills. Will you?
Tell him we continuously defeat the monsters. Anyone who is after the reward as a bounty hunter will work for us.%% We can't let you help us all the time either. So please, deliver our message
If you don't like it, nothing I can do.
Hurry and go.
Huh? Shangdor from the Mika tribe ask me to continuously defeat the monsters? I, Hunter G, accept that!%% Maybe I should show you're my gratitude, eh? Will you listen to me now?
Talk to Hunter G
Secure retreat route (5)

I usually show my real worth when I first accept the work. But there are no strong monsters around here to show off my ability.%% They are all sadly weak. So why don't you help me at same time get your own training too?

Hm.. Maybe this monster could be too much for you. In Grass Wind Hills, there is monster called Spore Spiders.%% defeat that spider and come back. Then I'll officially accept work from Shangdor.%% Get the shell of that spider since I'll give Shangdor as a present.
If you don't like it, nothing I can do.
Hurry and go.
Excellent work! Then I should show I will accept the job offer with this present. Give me the shell. I need to gift wrap it.
Spore Spider Shell
Present of Hunter G
Look at this. This ribbon really make it look like present, isn't it?
Give this to Shangdor and tell him I'll accept the job offer. Then go deliver my message.
If you don't like it, nothing I can do.
Hurry and go.
So this is Hunter G I heard of. He really showed off his ability.%% I'll take it as he took our job offer.
Talk to Shangdor
The life of smooth patrols (1)
Aha! Young man there! I think I get into too much fight while patrolling around here, and looking for mask for disguise.%% Can you find me one?

Good! Then bring me 50 of Agnee Masks, will you? Agnee tribe dominate areas around here, so their mask will really make my work easier.%% Find me 50 masks so our tribe can wear who are soon to be arrive in few weeks. Then I'll be waiting for you.
If you don't like it, nothing I can do.
Is my masks here yet?
Good! With this, my patrolling around this area will be a no problem. Thank you.
Agnee Mask
The life of smooth patrols (2)
Do you see the spears on my back here? I made this.%% This doesn't look anything like Agnee Spear so I will get caught easily. I was hoping to get their spear, too.

Just bring me same quantity I asked you before. 50 masks before, so I need 25 spears this time.%% You can find spears from Agnee Throwers. Find them at Mission map of Pine Cone Hills. Then be careful.
If you don't like it, nothing I can do.
Hurry and go.
This is worse than my own. Well, I didn't get it for actual combat, so who cares.%% Thank you.

Hey, we got a problem. Agnee Shamans found out we took some of their masks and spears.%% Before their leader know, we must defeat all of them around here. Will you help me?
I need to patrol. You can defeat 25 Agnee Shamans for me.
If you don't like it, nothing I can do.
Hurry and go.
What a excellent work. Hahaha! As you look, you work fast and nice!
Agnee Shaman

I need to report to Naoi that I am ready for patrol. I need to finish up with stuff you got me which get me busy, so why don't you go and deliver the word?
You know where Naoi is, right? Go left all the way, then you'll find Naoi.%% Go now.
Sheesh! I am busy!
Hurry and go.
Gurnek is working really hard. That's what I know.

Problematic Hors are disturbing our Shaman, Naoi's Mind. Hor cry out really loud.%% Can you defeat them?

If you don't like it, nothing I can do.

We found out why Hors cry so much. Hor got really angry because Spore Spider cut down trees around Hor's area.%% At this rate, they will cry endlessly. Let's solve this problem.

If you don't like it, nothing I can do.

If he come here and make a big mass, then Naoi will be seriously disturbed.%% Before that really happen, please defeat Woodsman Burnaun.%% Then go now.
If you don't like it, nothing I can do.
Hurry and go.
Excellent Work! You remind me of my young days.
Woodsman Burnaun
Unexpected enemy (1)
As we occupy this area, we warned monsters of our existence. Then we found unexpected enemy.%% We didn't know Yakut clan could be threat to us.

They are trying to attack us to take our territory as theirs. We must show them we are not easy one to put up the fight with.%% Prove them we are not easy one by defeating 5 Yakuts. Yakut can be found around Pine Cone Hills Mission.
If you want to help, come back again.
I hope they got our message now. I don't think they do though.
Unexpected enemy (2)
If you don't get our message, then we must warn them again. Will you take this mission?
There is soldier Yakut among them. Defeat 30 of soldier Yakuts and warn them again.
If you want to help, come back again.
I hope they got our message now. I don't think they do though.
Soldier Yakut (Pine Cone Hills )

They still ignores our warning message. Then we should go to them directly and show them.
Defeat Witch Doctor Yakut which is lowest level of Yakut clan. Defeat 20 of them will do.

Good work. But they still want to take over our territory. If they don't get our direct warning, then nothing we can do.

We want to make sure severe impact on woodsmen clan directly. Make full attack at once and make them confused.. Will you do it?
Defeat Angry Woodsman Paul Burnaun at Pine Cone Hills [Chaos Mode(F2)] 3 Maps. Then they will understand how strong we are.
If you want to help, come back again.
I don't think Wing clan could be a threat to us anymore. This is all because of you. Job well done.
Angry Woodsman Paul Burnaun [Chaos Mode(F2)] 3 Maps
Big Horned Wing
Another threat!

There were reason why woodsmen and Yakuts wanted to take over this territory. According to our information, Kentar fighters at Collapsed Sanctuary was threatening them. Pity.%% We need to make sure everyone can return to their own area. Let's defeat Kentars.
Defeat Toute and come back. I know this might not be easy work for you either, but I believe you can do it. I'll be waiting here.%% Toute will be around here wandering around.
If you want to help, come back again.
I am the person with few expression.. But.. I must agree you are good.%% Well done.
Kentar Fighter (Collapsed Sanctuary)
Equipment needed for tree felling operation
We must secure our camp with tree felling operation. If you use saw, the will damage tree too much.%% Sharp hook would work the best here! Find me that hook.

Why you need to find hook? As you can see, I am busy.%% This is not a free work, so why don't you just go. I just need 3 of shiny hooks. Finding Hook Woodsman with Hook won't be easy.%% Go to Pine Cone Hills Mission Lv.2 Broken Bridge, you might find them.
If you want to help, come back again.
Hey, you really got the hooks for me. Good job.%% I am sure work like this, Rugor won't give me more bothersome work anymore.

Last struggle to secure the camp (1)

Our reason to protect this camp is obvious. We must occupy this area for the sake of both our tribe and human beings.%% To reach our goal, our first mission is to secure this camp. We solve most of the problem through you.%% But we got the last problem. I hope you can solve that problem too.%% I want to take care of it myself but I must protect Naoi here. I can't leave Naoi by herself.%% Please resolve this problem.

The main problem is Burnaun, the leader of woodsman. He's the our final enemy here.%% If you wander through main fields, you probably confronted him but real Burnaun only exist within the mission map. You must defeat imperfect Burnauns in order to meet perfect Burnaun.%% First, defeat imperfect Burnaun in mission map.
If you want to help, come back again.
You went through a lot and did it. But this mission will be difficult for you, too%% Take a rest for a while before you get started.

I guess you are not our enemy since you try to help us. We are Mist Elves who confronted Elga with human in the past.%% There are only few of us who are separated from other elves. We believed that human will be sided with us and go back to normal life again.. that was our belief until now%% I don't even remember how long we've been hiding like this. We heard the rumor that monster we created to confront the evil dragon before is active now.%% If pure elves find out if that monster is still active, they'll put more soldiers to catch us.%% To avoid that, we need to deactivate the monster Aram and figure out what made this monster to activate again. The one who is behind all this is human we trusted so much. Power of human who became evil is stronger than our power.

The First Diary of Dr. Farrell
Welcome. I finally crack the code of Dr. Farrell's First Diary. Do you want to listen?

Well~ What's inside... {C=0xFF4400BB/}I wanted to make human and animals free from an incurable disease through biological way. It will be amazing even we just thought about it! There's no patient who suffered from a disease, and there will be no one struggle against with a pain... the world must be fulfill of bright and wonderful dream! Then People will not need a God anymore if my dreams come true. {C=0xFF4400BB/}I was exchanging my opinion with Arcanist Pablo and we researched together beyond on the boarder of science and magic. However, we have met a barrier of research and there's no more progression in our research project.%% {C=0xFF4400BB/}Someday, Paris came to me. And she told me that her young and immortality will make people happier, and she agreed my research along with she let me know everything what she got during her entire life such as alchemy, incantation, and many knowledge. Therefore, I finally got over my research barrier by degrees. {C=0xFF4400BB/}However, I was greedy too much. I researched relentlessly and finally discovered a cell which can control every organism's birth, old age, sickness, and death. And I discovered the way to control of it. Eventually, I've achieved my research that I can control a cell by one simple pill. {C=0xFF4400BB/}But, I needed to cease my research there. My overcrowded desire was whispering me to challenge a God's authority. And finally... I found the way to do. {C=0xFF4400BB/}I shouldn't have to make a dragon which wasn't necessary through a toenail of Elga...%% {C=0xFF4400BB/}I and Paris, we called this organism as Magma Drake Lavalon. But, suddenly I couldn't control myself and my memory was so blurry. Is it a side-effect of medicine that I made?%% {C=0xFF4400BB/}I became violent and my spirit distorted as much as my physical distortion. Is it a compensation of my arrogance which I tried to get over the line of God?%% Here is the content of first diary.. what a surprise... Please give me second one%% It is...!!! It is also!!!!!! I'm surprised!%% A code, again! ......... .....................%% I can decode it....... at a glance. I think it must be different style of code. But I know a guy who can decode it.%% That is a Pablo He was mentioned in the first diary so he might know about this already. Get this diary and go to Libra and ask Pablo to decode it, which is much faster way!
I just decode it...

Ah? A favor of Larell? Okay what Larell said?%% Ah... he wanted to decode Dr. Farrell's diary but he didn't know something about it? Of course I know substances. Because I wrote it together with him%%
Are you still here?
You lost Dr. Farrell's Diary? You are so lucky because I got a duplicated one. I will give it to you.
Huh? Dr. Farrell's Diary? I don't think that I have...?

Farrell's Diary???

What!? Farrell's diary!!? What......! What the grave is that?? I haven't heard of that thing before? I hope you don't do stupid things in front of me. I haven't had good sleep for a while, you know.%% It makes my brain blank...
I said that I am not in the right mood!!
I said that I am not in the right mood!!
Speak with Larell

I see, I see. I am not sure about that thing, Farrell's diary or whatever, but don't you have to gain my favor if you want to ask me something anyway??%% What about... do my favor first?? After that, let's do the interpretation or decoding something which you are asking, OK?
Can't Sleep!
Good. Nice decision. My favor is only one thing right now. The graveyard! Behind me! I cannot sleep recently because of the continuous sound coming from there!

It sounds like footsteps... sound of dragging something... I don't know but something is there inside. I don't care what method you will use. Just get rid of that sound!! OK?!%% Oh, yes!! You! Get in there and remove everything! Ha! Then there will be no sounds, right??
Don't ask anything to me from now on. You got it?
Do it! Now! Within tonight!!
Defeat the Coffin Keeper

Ah~ very nice. Quiet. Here. Take this. Reward for you to take care of things. Very effective in the battle with ghosts. OK~. Then night night!?%% ...... ......... ............... Ek... I cannot sleep!!!
I need a sleeping peel
I cannot hear any sounds but... Jet lag? I cannot sleep!! Why?!!

I think I need a sleeping aids. It is a medicine called [Good night baby No. 3].. The ingredients probably are... Mandrake Root and Gravegrass Leaf.%% What are you doing?? Go in there and get ingredients!! You've been there, so you know where to find things, right? Bring me 10 Mandrake Roots and 30 Gravegrass Leaves.
Don't do it if you don't want to. But don't ever thing to ask something about Farrell's diary, OK?
I cannot sleep.... Bring me Mandrake Root and Gravegrass Leaf.
Oh! Good.... Mix like this, squeeze... and eat...! Not look fancy but works good! Here we go!!!~ %% ...... ......... Yikes~~ What on grave is this?!%% What is this taste??!!
Mandrake Root
Gravegrass Leaf
May the peace be with you
Ah, I am so tired It feels so good and sleepy now.. What? Wh....at.....did you said? Fa...Far.........away? ....z...z...zz....
What? Wh....at.....did you said?
Speak with Larell

Ah! Yes! You have Favor, right?%% ...... ......%% ............%% .........! Oh my~! I dozed off a bit.%% So... Where were we now?? Wasn't it something about the gem?? As I said, I am not that expert on those kind of night life... %% Huh? Not this one? Let's talk tomorrow. I cannot talk with you... any... mo...... ( It seems like he fell asleep.)
Horrible Scream
Thanks for the last time. Now I will help you this time.

So what you've requested is to interpret Farrell's Diary right? Hmm... B.U.T. There is something that really annoys me right now...%% {C=0xFFFF0000/}AAHHHHHH~~ It's a DRAGON~!!!{C=0xFF4D0D08/}%% ...That one.!!!%% {C=0xFFFF0000/}AAHHHHHH~~ It's a DRAGON~!!!{C=0xFF4D0D08/}%% That's the one which annoys me so much right now. I thought the world is quiet again, but the screams have come now. How can a dragon be in that tiny graveyard anyway... %% {C=0xFFFF0000/}AAHHHHHH~~ It's a DRAGON~!!!{C=0xFF4D0D08/}%% Ah! Not again!!! It makes me so crazy! Is there really a Dragon in there or is someone just screaming inside for fun? Can you go in and check for me?%% If so, I will interpret the diary for you.
Give me the diary. I will burn it.
{C=0xFFFF0000/}AAHHHHHH~~ It's a DRAGON~!!!{C=0xFF4D0D08/}%% Ah! Not again!!!
Dragon of Graveyard
It seems like you did your job done. No more screams any more. Ha! I don't think there was actual dragon was there, so who was it?%% What? Really? A dragon was there? And his Gem???
Dangerous Thing
Dragon's gem...!! Ah~~

The gem in the myth, right?? It is more like a core which can intrigue magical forces around itself.%% Isn't it too dangerous such a human like you carry around? How about save it somewhere else?? Oh yes, how about Dragon Lord's spirit?%% It is not that easy to find if you ask him to take it. The gem will be safe with him.
Monsters will gonna love you if you keep having it.
Go to Dragon Lord's spirit.
Heroes... That's... A Dragon's gem!!!
Speak with Dragon Lord's Spirit
Repay of Dragon Lord
So the thing happened at last, which I worried about.

If Elga's people had this gem, a disaster would have happened. What a great job you did. I appreciate..%% As repay to your faithfulness, I will make holy strength will protect you from now on. Visit blacksmith with this.
You don't need my grace?
Visit Blacksmith Smith.

Did you lost my communicator? I will give you another one.
Lord Junior's Communicator? You don't have it, do you?
Lord Junior's Communicator? Well... {C=0xFF016295/}Help him to make holy armors.{C=0xFF4D0D08/}%% Ah.. finally...
Armor which protects you from spectres
This is place where had lots of battles in old days so spectres' energy is stronger than any other places. If you have holy armor, it will protects you greatly.

Conversation with Midas
Home of Archer
We are the Mika Tribe! We live within the trees that covers the sky. We are also very proud of our skillful archers. We shall always be victorious as long as we are within this forest!
Tsk...! Do you think that is funny?
Conversation with Shangdor

However... Recently, the spirits from {C=0xFFFF0000/}Verdurous Forest{C=0xFF4D0D08/} have become crazy, and at the same time a logger named Burnaun has begun to destroy the forest. Our tribe is facing grave danger, a kind of danger we've never faced before.
Finding Orhah
Since then... Our tribe is diminishing, with tribe members leaving here and there, but we must bring the old glory back to our tribe!

To bring back the tribe members, we need someone that everyone trusts! If she is here, people will come back! She is the most trusted person from our tribe! %% Shaman Orhah! Find her! We've heard that she is somewhere north from here. We has to carry on the battle with the Burnaun. So, can you look for her?
You do not understand this situation!
We've heard that she is somewhere north from here.
Find Orhah

{C=0xFF016295/}Spirit of the forest... Please listen to my prayer.{C=0xFF4D0D08/}%% Why did you come here? I am here to pray to the forest spirits, to end the destruction of Verdurous Forest. So I cannot leave this place.%% Return to the village? I wish I could...%% AARGH~!
Opening the Spiritual Eye
Ah..! Failed again. I was trying to look into the foggy area inside Verdurous Forest with my spiritual eye. Anyways... What? The tribe needs me to bring the tribe members back?

I am sorry. I believe that solving the problems in Verdurous Forest comes first. I cannot see into Verdurous Forest despite using my spiritual eye. Something important is happening inside, but it is too hazy.%% I am going to have to make my spiritual eye stronger. Would you help me? Please bring me 30 Spider Shells and 40 Squirrel Droppings. I need to ground those two ingredients and rub the powder on my eye to strengthen my spiritual eye.
Please do not disturb me.
The two ingredients can be found around here.
Oh you found them! Would you mix them up for me?%% ...... ......... Is it ready?%% Ok, good. Now if I put this on my eye... Ah! I can see! That is...! Mist Elf guard Hel Krouzer!!?
Spider Shell
Squirrel Dropping
Mist Elf!
Past {C=0xFF016295/}Misty Lane{C=0xFF4D0D08/}.. Inside Verdurous Forest... That is.. Mist Elf Guard Hel Krouzer.. Huh?

Hel Krouzer seems to be facing an enemy. The situation seems very bad. Heroes.. Please enter Verdurous Forest and help Hel Krouzer.%% I must warn you that Verdurous Forest has many poisonous monsters. Visit a shop and buy lots of Globule Pills, and please hurry.
Ah.. This headache...
Please enter Verdurous Forest through Misty Lane and help Hel Krouzer.
Rescue Hel Krouzer
Argh..! Are you Ok? This is rather embarrassing. Ah..! Guardian Ryvius is still..
Crazy Guardian
Ah..! Why is this happening..
Mist Elf guardian Ryvius... And our best Shaman Mutisha... She is..
Are you planning to turn the Mist Elves against you?
Are you planning to turn the Mist Elves against you?
Conversation with Hel Krouzer
Mutisha is beyond this point... We will owe the Dragon Fellowship. Please Stop...Mutisha.%% Go ahead. We shall follow you as soon as we heal our wounds.
Shaman of the Fog and Purification
No.. We missed Mutisha! Ancient Golem Aram... Is Mutisha heading to {C=0xFFFF0000/}Kundara{C=0xFF4D0D08/}?
We will chase after Mutisha. We would like you to remain here and help purify the forest. If you wear the ring I've given to you at the Altar of Verdure, the ring will begin to purify the forest.
All we need to do is purify the forest.
Has the forest been purified?
Purification of the forest
Oh.. .. n..no.. Ah..! Dragon Lord. Why is our people facing such a terrible fate...
Chasing the Shaman
We have failed, but we will not give up! We Mist Elves will chase after Mutisha.
If Mutisha revives Aram.... It will destroy everything. Mutisha... Must be stopped We will head to Gods' Sanctuary. Will you help us?
Do you think your world is going to be safe?
We will head towards Gods' Sanctuary.
Conversation with Hel Krouzer (Gods' Sanctuary)
You are finally here! We have managed to follow Mutisha here, but her traces disappeared at the entrance of the Kundara Dungeon. We believe Mutisha is somewhere inside the Kundara Dungeon.
Request of Mist Elf
Phew.. That is difficult to obtain... Hel Krouzer would be very disappointed. If we do not have it, there is only one way. We must get help from the Mika Tribe..

Would you tell Naoi at Pine Cone Hills, about the situation at Verdurous Forest. We, Mist Elves, have to move to a different place to face another danger, so please tell the Mika Tribe to purify the forest. This.. is my reward to you. Ask Naoi how to make Elf Armor. If you tell Naoi that I said it was Ok, then she will tell you~ Ok~ See you around!
Hut! You refuse to help Rudaella! You have no idea what you are doing!
Tell Naoi about the situation, she is at Pine Cone Hills,
Conversation with Naoi

So that is what went on at Verdurous Forest! Definitely... I can feel the pollution has slowed down.%% We cannot offer much as we have to stop Burnaun the logger.. But we are also from the forest... We do not wish the forest to be polluted. We will assist as much as we can.
Successor to the tradition
Ah..! Mist Elf armors? Mist Elves are not well known and it has been that way for a long time. They have their own unique methods of creating armors.
Go and talk to Blacksmith Rugor. He will tell you about Mist Elf armor.
Mist Elf armor is not an easy thing to find or obtain.
Rugor is around here, so it would be easy to find him.
Conversation with Blacksmith Rugor

Mist Elf armor? Of course, I know! I never succeeded making one because the ingredients are hard to find... However, it is possible to make one.%% Probably, Hel Krouzer and his followers also wear them. Why? You wish to make Mist Elf armor?
Fog Glue
The other parts are not much of a problem... The main problem occurs when we try to put the parts together.

They only come together when a specific ingredient is used. That specific ingredient is Fog Glue, and you can get them only at Verdurous Forest.%% If we can get that glue, the rest will be easy. We can get the other parts from the Mist Elf's forest as they lived there till recently. When we have all the parts, we can put the parts together.%% If you want to make Mist Elf armor.. The Fog Glue is essential. There is not a lot of it around, but we will need a lot of it.%% Around 200 Fog Glue will be enough. If you wish to make the armor, you need to bring me the Fog Glue.
Huh? If you did not want them, you should not have mentioned it!
The Fog Glues can be found at Verdurous Forest
Fog Glue
You brought the Fog Glue! Well done. Now all you have to find the armor parts to make a piece of armor
Holy Armor
Ok! Now... Let's make a helmet!

Go to Verdurous Forest. While hunting monsters, if you are lucky, you will find some helmet pieces. If you collect all the helmet pieces, we should able to make one whole helmet.%% It's not just any 5 pieces of helmet. I need one of each part!%% Isn't it obvious? Anyways, good luck!
Hey, it's not my loss, suit yourself!
5 pieces of Mist Elf helmets! One of each part!
Mist Elf Helmet Left Piece
Mist Elf Helmet Right Piece
Mist Elf Helmet Front Piece
Mist Elf Helmet Rear Piece
Mist Elf Helmet Top Piece

Wow, you got them all?!! You are tougher than you look.%% Hmm.. Let me have those pieces. Once I have the parts, it is easy to make it. Let see...%% ...... ............ Here you go! All done! Good luck with it!!
For the forest
The Dragon Fellowship... Won't you help us?
If we could reduce the number of monsters in Verdurous Forest, it would help greatly with purifying the forest.
Ah.. The situation is bad... Sob.
Please defeat the monsters at Verdurous Forest.
Defeat monsters
Thank you. We are very grateful.
Unavoidable destiny
The forest is the home of the Elves.. The Elves will lose their home if the forest does not get purified.

I am here to control the forest spirits through prayer, but I can only do it for so long. The Dragon Fellowship... Would you enter the forest and defeat Rotten Tree Spirit?%% It will be sad to destroy a tree.. but I believe it is necessary. Please help me.
Ah.. Please.. We need your help.
Please, enter Verdurous Forest and defeat Rotten Tree Spirit.
Thorny Tree Spirit

Thank you. The rate of the forest destruction has been reduced greatly. But the pollution will carry on to other trees. So the Rotten Tree spirit needs to be destroyed continuously.%% Would you help us tomorrow as well?
Grass Wind Hills
Verdurous Forest
Poisonous Tree Spirit
Rotten Tree Spirit

Collect The Secret Scroll of Cherry Blossom

Oh my, I very much appreciated the last time. My village had peace brought back to it, thanks to your help. My restaurant is back in business, too. By the way, do you have time? If so, could you help me for a minute?

Oh.My.God. I'm so pleased ! Well, actually, there's a very old storage behind my restaurant. Last time, I found the old letter when I went inside of that storage. And it said, 'there's The Secret Scroll of Cherry Blossom hidden somewhere in my restaurant.....' Evidently, The Secret Scroll of Cherry Blossom will show how to make a Cherry Blossom accessory. From my dad, I heard that the person that collects those of accessories can use the secret skill, Cherry Blossom. You're the brave one who deserves to use the secret skill, Cherry Blossom. The Secret Scroll of Cherry Blossom will be hidden in {C=0xFF016295}[Haruka’s Sushi restaurant] F1~4's somewhere. Please collect 4 of The Secret Scroll of Cherry Blossom.
I see....... I'm sorry that you are not interested in The Secret Scroll of Cherry Blossom.
Well.... Not ready yet?

Wow, I knew it ! You're really great! That was quick! Then, I should work on making accessories!! Done ! It's new, a [Cherry Blossom Necklace]. I think we can get more of The Secret Scroll of Cherry Blossom. If you bring more, I can make you a different Cherry Blossom accessory.
Well.... Not ready yet?

For my brother.

Rescue heroes from another world [1]
Kill Lavalon

I found a way to summon a hero from another world! Perhaps he can help you on your adventures. Interested? Then you will need to help me a little, first create a group of at least two people, and go after Lavalon to kill him.
Good job! Now I will tell you what to do next.
Rescue heroes from another world [2]
Complete the Cart Mission
The second step to summon a hero from another world is to complete the escort mission that can be found in Windy Farm.
Rescue heroes from another world [3]
Kill Ryvius
The third step and the last one to summon a hero from another world is to kill the Ryvius. After that, we will finally summon a hero from another world.
Congratulations, we have summoned a hero from another world. You can see it in the character selection menu.
Test of strength
Valid Raeth [Defense Mode(F6)] Stage 10
Valid Raeth [Tactic Mode(F7)] Stage 50
Hello hero! Are you familiar with defense modes? Recently, quests for escorting a cart with resources have appeared in Windy Farm. Before you go there, complete the old defense modes.
You did it, now you can safely entrust you with quests for the escort mission.
Studying the enemy
Kentar Fighter
Perry Jerry
Kentar Scout

Great, now you are familiar with protection modes. Your first escort quest will be to kill the monsters that most often attack the resource cart. Killing them will make it easier for you to deal with them in the future.
Congratulations, now you know all about these monsters.
Reach 300 combos
Even though you can easily deal with attacking monsters, I think you should hone your skills.
I think now you have no equal in killing these monsters, maybe you can easily deal with them even with your eyes closed.
Important escorting
Complete an escort mission
Now you can be entrusted with the escort of cargo of any importance. That's why I trust you to make a cart with very valuable crystals.
Thank you very much hero, you can take one of the legendary tools as a reward, with it you can easily get resources to improve your equipment.
Becoming an adept
Eye of Aram
Lavalon Heart
Greetings, hero! What? Are you looking for more power? I can suggest you become an adept. You have to go through difficult tests for this. Are you ready?
You passed all the tests! I'm surprised only a few of the people I know among the people could do it. Now I will initiate you into the art of adepts. [Now you can create a drakan race character]
